snippet.title: Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden - Launch trailer
snippet.description: Coming to Xbox One on December 4th! Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden is a tactical adventure game combining the turn-based combat of XCOM with story, exploration, stealth, and strategy. Take control of a team of Mutants navigating a post-human Earth. Created by a team including former HITMAN leads and the designer of PAYDAY.
